pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile Regression // Estimation and inference methods for models for conditional quantile functions: Linear and nonlinear parametric and non-parametric (total variation penalized) models for conditional quantiles of a univariate response and several methods for handling censored survival data. Portfolio selection methods based on expected shortfall risk are also now included. See Koenker, R. (2005) Quantile Regression, Cambridge U. Press, doi:10.1017/CBO9780511754098 and Koenker, R. et al. (2017) Handbook of Quantile Regression, CRC Press, doi:10.1201/9781315120256.
